title: Employee Management
first: The Employee Management module is a crucial part of a payroll system, ensuring that all employee-related data is accurately maintained for seamless payroll processing.

title: Payroll Processing
first: The Payroll Processing module is the core component of a payroll system, responsible for accurately calculating employee salaries and ensuring timely payments.

title: Reports & Integrations
first: The Reports & Integrations module plays a vital role in a payroll system by providing detailed financial insights and seamless connectivity with external systems.
